Navbar

The navbar has to be placed outside the container.

File to include

@include "components/navbar";

Normal navbar

  • Link
  • Link
  • Link
  • Link
  • Dropdown

    • Item

    • Item
<header class="navbar">
    <nav>
            <div class="logo"><a href="#"><img src="/assets/images/logo-fajny-css-white.svg" alt=""></a></div>
            <input type="checkbox" name="burger" id="burger" class="input-burger">
            <label for="burger" class="hamburger">
                <span></span>
                <span></span>
                <span></span>
            </label>

            <ul class="ul-nav">
                <li><a href="#">Link</a></li>
                <li><a href="#">Link</a></li>
                <li><a href="#">Link</a></li>
                <li><a href="#">Link</a></li>
                <li class="dropdown">
                    <a href="#" class="btn-dropdown">Dropdown</a>
                    <ul class="dropdown-content">
                        <li><a href="#">Item</a></li>
                        <li><a href="#">Item</a></li>
                        <li><a href="#">Item</a></li>
                        <li><a href="#">Item</a></li>
                        <li><a href="#">Item</a></li>
                    </ul>
                </li>
            </ul>
    </nav>
</header>

Full page nav

See the demo here. 
<header class="header-full">

    <label for="burger2" class="hamburger">
            <span></span>
            <span></span>
            <span></span>
    </label>
